name: Pip!
description:
Pip!, a simple 2D puzzle game made with Unity that involves triggering arrow like 'pips' to shoot into one another in a chain reaction with the aim of hitting every pip on screen.

The game starts out simple and gets drastically more complex over the course of its 40 levels.

Its stye is simple and upbeat with cheerful melodies and positive backdrops.

Versions available are standard and 'Classic', for Windows, Linux, and OS X. 'Classic' version is an old build with completely 2D graphics while the standard version has upgraded graphics with 3D models and dynamic lighting.

Android versions of Pip! and Pip! Classic are available on the Google Play store.

This is my first solo project released online.
Let me know what you think.
